vampire.config_products.MODISLSTDatasetImpl module¶

class vampire.config_products.MODISLSTDatasetImpl.MODISLSTDatasetImpl(interval, product_date, vampire_defaults, region=None)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.MODISDatasetImpl.MODISDatasetImpl

Initialise MODISLSTDatasetImpl object.

Implementation class for MODISLSTDataset. Initialise object parameters and calculate start and end dates for dataset using product_date and interval.

interval : string
Data interval to retrieve/manage. Can be daily, pentad, dekad, monthly or seasonal
product_date : datetime
Data acquisition date. For pentad/dekad data, the data is actually for the period immediately preceding the product_date. For monthly data, the data covers the month given in the product date. For seasonal data, the product_date refers to the start of the season (3 month period).
